channel.title: zend framework on Daniel Berstein
channel.description: Recent content in zend framework on Daniel Berstein

item.title: Recommendation :: Matthew Weier O'Phinney
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: Daniel is a superb PHP developer. His knowledge of PHP and its capabilities is expansive. Additionaly, he is able to analyze business requirements and distill them into deliverables – and execute those deliverables both expeditiously and effectively. I have found him an amiable colleague; I cannot recommend him highly enough.

item.title: Recommendation :: Ruslan Glick
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: Daniel is one of the best programmers and software designers i met. He was able to leverage his extensive knowledge to solving any problems with very efficient approaches. I had the pleasure of working with Daniel in the same team (1.5 years) I wish all the best in his future and I’m sure he will contribute a lot in his new jobs. Keep in touch!
